title: File Path Split Function
description:
FILE_PATH_SPLIT The module split a fle path into its component elements. The drive, path 

and fle name are extracted and stored in the data structure X. As 

directory separator "\" and "/" will be accepted. If the passed "File name" is 

not empty and elements can be evaluated, the module returns TRUE, 

otherwise FALSE.
name: FILE_PATH_SPLIT

input.name: INPUT_FILE_NAME
input.description: The input file path as a string.

in/out.name: X
in/out.description: A data structure that stores the extracted components of the file path.

return_value.description: Returns TRUE if the input file name is valid and elements can be evaluated, FALSE otherwise.
